stix:STIX_Header.stix:Title: Phishing Email with an Incoming Fax Report Theme Contains Malicious Link
stix:STIX_Header.stix:Description: On 27 January 2015, a phishing email with the subject "INCOMING FAX REPORT (scanned from MFP742 for [REDACTED])" was observed. The email was sent from "noreply.mfp742@gmail.com" and included a link to a ZIP archive at "https://courtnotify.elpasotexas.gov/eFAX/hppscan/854.ZIP".

stix:Indicator.indicator:Description:
----- BEGIN EMAIL HEADERS ----- Date: Tue Jan 27 12:50:21 GMT 2015 From: eFax <noreply.mfp742@gmail.com>; To: [REDACTED] Subject: INCOMING FAX REPORT (scanned from MFP742 for [REDACTED]) ----- END EMAIL HEADERS ----- ----- BEGIN EMAIL BODY ----- ********************************************************* INCOMING FAX REPORT ********************************************************* Date/Time: Tue, Jan 27, 2015 at 7:49 AM Speed: 5140bps Connection time: 01:04 Pages: 1 Resolution: Normal Line number: 0 DTMF/DID: Description: hppscan854.pdf Please use the following link to download your file: https://courtnotify.elpasotexas.gov/eFAX/hppscan/854.ZIP This email is UNCLASSIFIED. ********************************************************* CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: This electronic message contains information which may be legally confidential and/or privileged. The information is intended solely for the individual or entity named above and access by anyone else is unauthorized. If you are not the intended recipient, any disclosure, copying, distribution, or use of the contents of this information is prohibited and may be unlawful. If you have received this electronic transmission in error, please reply immediately to the sender that you have received the message in error, and delete it.. Thank you. ----- END EMAIL BODY -----
The subject of the email presumably contained the name of recipient. As a result, the actual subject was not included within the STIX structure.
The link "https://courtnotify.elpasotexas.gov/eFAX/hppscan/854.ZIP" contained in the email leads to a confirmed malicious file.
